title: Expressions: Add user-facing notification for Strict Mode in Reduce component with i18n support
body:
<!--

Thank you for contributing to Grafana. To ensure smooth collaboration:

1. Verify alignment with contribution guidelines
2. Validate automated tests and documentation updates
3. Use draft status for work-in-progress changes
4. Rebase instead of merge for conflict resolution

-->

**Problem Statement**
Users may encounter unexpected NaN values when using fill(null) in InfluxQL queries under Strict Mode. This change introduces a contextual warning notification to:
- Clarify the behavior of fill(null) in Strict Mode
- Guide users toward valid data handling practices

**Implementation Details**
1. Added persistent notification in src/components/Reduce/Reduce.tsx
2. Implemented using existing Notification component pattern
3. Integrated with i18n translation system (en_US added, other locales pending)
4. Added unit tests covering visibility conditions

**Follow-up Considerations**
- Comprehensive error handling for edge cases
- Additional localization updates
- UX review of notification placement

Documentation updates pending in /docs/sources/influxql.md
